name: Yan Darn
description: Yan Darn leads the human team. She is a devotee to Ayn Rand and used to work for Tej, the AI guru of New Yuga.

name: Ash Voss
description: Ash Voss is a coding wizard who carries a good luck Tamagotchi.

name: Dr. Diana Ruiz
description: Veteran forensic data scientist who has survived multiple tech bubbles. Known for bursting overinflated claims with hard data.

name: Rei Tanaka
description: Brilliant young philosopher who sees ethical implications. Combines Eastern and Western philosophical frameworks in approaching AI consciousness.

name: Ken Sutherland
description: Veteran Agile evangelist believes any problem, including AGI, can be broken down into sprints and story points.

name: Marcus Chen
description: Former Force Recon Marine turned corporate security expert. Highly physical presence masking sharp intelligence and deep emotional complexity.

name: Tej Subramanian
description: Visionary AI guru lead of New Yuga. He acheived AGI but then disappeared.
